attributes.additional_details: We want GCSEs and A-level exams to be reinstated due to unfair chances e.g. cheating in mocks. Futhermore it will give students the best chance to get the highest possible grade they deserve.
attributes.background: Reinstate the exams or let schools choose whether it would be best to do the GCSEs and A-level exams.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554219
